se.jguru.nazgul.core.persistence.api.helpers

Class ParameterMapBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.core.persistence.api.helpers.ParameterMapBuilder

  • public final class ParameterMapBuilder
extends Object

    Utility builder class intended to simplify creation of a NamedQuery parameter Map. Typical Usage:

         
         // Create the ParameterMapBuilder
         Map<String, Object> parameters = ParameterMapBuilder
              .with("foo", "bar")
              .and("gnat", 42)
              .and("someData", 25.6d)
              .build();
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Method Detail

      • with

        public static ParameterMapBuilder with(String name,
                                       Object value)

        Creates the ParameterMapBuilder with the first parameter having the supplied name/key and value. Usage:

             
         // Create the ParameterMapBuilder
         Map<String, Object> parameters = ParameterMapBuilder
              .with("foo", "bar")
              .and("gnat", 42)
              .build();
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the first parameter.
        value - The value of the first parameter.
        Returns:
        The ParameterMapBuilder instance used to construct the Parameter map.

      • and

        public ParameterMapBuilder and(String name,
                               Object value)

        Adds the supplied name/key to value parameter to this ParameterMapBuilder. Usage:

             
         // Create the ParameterMapBuilder
         Map<String, Object> parameters = ParameterMapBuilder
              .with("foo", "bar")
              .and("gnat", 42)
              .build();
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the parameter to add.
        value - The value of the parameter to add.
        Returns:
        This ParameterMapBuilder.

      • build

        public Map<String,Object> build()

        Retrieves the Map holding name/key to value parameters from this ParameterMapBuilder. Usage:

             
         // Create the ParameterMapBuilder
         Map<String, Object> parameters = ParameterMapBuilder
              .with("foo", "bar")
              .and("gnat", 42)
              .build();
        Returns:
        the Map holding name/key to value parameters from this ParameterMapBuilder.
